recommendations: Replace 'localhost' in .env.production with actual production hostname (e.g., 'yourdomain.com' or production server IP)
Replace '127.0.0.1' in .env.production with actual production hostname or configure via environment variables
Use secrets manager (AWS Secrets Manager, Azure Key Vault, or similar) to store production hostnames securely
Verify CORS_ORIGINS are set to production frontend URLs, not localhost
Consider using environment-specific configuration files with proper validation
